description:
Credits to u/Rh_4m for the superthresh guide.  

Also, this bug isnt unique to thresher, but works for pretty much every animal with a click and charge ability.

And it’s keyboard only so if you don’t have a keyboard this won’t work.

social_networks.platform_user_id: 2. *while actually playing in the match*, open the settings, and start rapidly clicking on the webGL toggle, turning it on and off repeatedly.

3. after at least 5s (the longer, the better), stop the webgl spam clicking. *make sure that when you stop the spam, webgl is DISABLED* 　　　　　　　　　　4. end the PD or 1v1 match. doesnt matter if you win or lose.
5. when you get to the postgame screen for either mode (the screen with the chatbox in either mode), do nothing. Literally. Don't press continue, dont press esc. Just wait.

6. It may take a bit (probably no more than 10 mins), but eventually deeeep should automatically kick you out of the postgame screen, returning you to the main menu. If, when this happens, a popup shows, saying "fatal error occured, reload the game".
After the fatal error… nothing! You’re done after the error! So now go play the game. PS: if you reload the tab you have to preform the glitch again.
